column5: Can anyone comment on the new Frabill power stow nets? http://www.frabill.com/catalogsearch/result/?q=Powerstow%20net  It looks like they have joined forces with Stowmaster on this one http://stowmaster.norsemenoutdoors.com/shop/category/stowmaster/tournament . Just wondering what the netting is like etc.

I have a musky sized one.  Mesh is finer than I like and the bag is too deep, but overall I really like it.  Pretty sure the mesh is exactly the same as the new stowmasters (their old mesh is different).
Depending on what size you want, i believe Bass Pro has their own branded version of a stowmaster as well.  Smaller sizes (bass, etc)
cram gave a good review - I own the stowmaster.

Thanks guys. I verified that this net is made under license from Stowmaster. I was thinking something along the lines of the 94IM in the stowmaster, sounds like these nets are really deep! 42 and 50 for the 94IM comparable version.
I have the 94x... I love it
